text: praqjAM paqSUnavRu#~jjataq tasmA#dEqtA(gm) sa#M~Mvaqrga itIShTi#mAhuqryO BrAtRu#vyavAqnthsyAth sasparddha#mAna EqtayEShTyA# yajEtAqgnayE# saM~MvaqrgAya# purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqtta(gm)SRuqtamAsa#nnamEqtEnaq yaju#ShAq&Bi mRu#SEqdOja# Eqva bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M praqjAM paqSUn BrAtRu#vyasya vRu~gktEq Bava#tyAqtmanAq parA$syaq BrAtRu#vyO Bavati || 11  (bala#masyEq - tayA# dEqvA asu#rANAqmOjOq bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M - pa~jca#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A3)
